div.p: (a) Overview of a young (1–10 years old) retrogressive thaw slump (RTS) on the south shore of lake NE‐14 in the Alaskan Low Arctic, (b) dead shrub in RTS chute at lake I‐minus 1 caused by mass soil wasting, (c) seedlings on bare soil in young RTS at lake I‐minus 1, and (d) tall shrubs in old (≥30 years old) RTS at NE‐14
